title: What do you do when your child doesn't like you at school? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on his grades if you are not satisfied with child’s grades, don’t care at all. if you are satisfied with grades, try to look like/ act like other parents at school. Ask him if you can. if you satisfy 2nd condition and he still doesn’t like you at school then , try visiting his school often. He might be hiding something bigger than you might think. Have conversations with his teachers. Try to reach out to his friends and their parents. Be friends with his friends parents. Follow his friends on social media with fake accounts. You might find them drinking alcohol or like that. Or like that.

Well my daughter doesn't get any choice since I work at her school. If I am at the middle school for my other 2 well, then I am there for a damn good reason since I'm missing work to be there, so tough if the don't like it.
